text: Vaaraahi Chalana Chitram () is a leading Indian film production house in India that produces Telugu films. It was established by Sai Korrapati. ==Film production== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- ! No ! Year ! Film ! Language ! Cast ! Director !
